# GREEN
# walk to the right
4001	40001	100	40002	100
# walk to the left
4002	40011	100	40012	100
# lie up
4003	40021	100
# rolling up
4004	40022	100	40023	100	40024	100	40025	100
# lie down
4005	40031	100
# rolling down
4006	40032	100	40033	100	40034	100	40035	100
# fly to the right
4007	40003	50	40004	50	40005	50	40006	50
# fly to the left
4008	40013	50	40014	50	40015	50	40016	50

# GREEN
# walk to the right
4011	40041	100	40042	100
# walk to the left
4012	40051	100	40052	100
# lie up
4013	40061	100
# rolling up
4014	40062	100	40063	100	40064	100	40065	100
# lie down
4015	40071	100
# rolling down
4016	40072	100	40073	100	40074	100	40075	100
# fly to the right
4017	40043	50	40044	50	40045	50	40046	50
# fly to the left
4018	40053	50	40054	50	40055	50	40056	50
